name: Topview AI
description: Topview AI is an AI-powered video editor that transforms links or media assets into viral marketing videos with one click.
longDescription: Topview AI is an innovative online platform that leverages artificial intelligence to streamline video creation for businesses, marketers, and content creators. By automating tasks like scriptwriting, clip selection, editing, and voiceovers, it transforms raw media or product links into engaging, high-quality videos optimized for platforms like TikTok, YouTube, and Instagram. The platform uses advanced AI technologies, including GPT-4o and ElevenLabs, to generate viral scripts and realistic voiceovers, making professional video production accessible without requiring editing expertise. Its mission is to boost video production efficiency by five times while reducing costs to just 5% of traditional editing methods. Topview AI supports e-commerce businesses, social media managers, and creators by offering tools like AI avatars and multi-language support to enhance global reach and engagement. It is trusted by companies worldwide for creating scalable, studio-quality marketing content without the need for filming or actors.
features: AI Script Generator creates compelling video scripts using GPT-4o, trained on millions of viral ads to maximize engagement.
AI Video Generator automatically produces videos from text inputs or product links, streamlining the creation process.
AI-Powered Clip Selection identifies and edits the best clips from uploaded media to form cohesive, polished videos.
AI Voiceover provides ultra-realistic voiceovers in over 23 languages, enhancing video accessibility and appeal.
AI Avatars offer customizable, lifelike digital characters to present products in a natural, engaging way.
AI Auto-Caption generates accurate captions to improve video accessibility and viewer comprehension.
Product Avatar 2 allows AI avatars to wear, sit on, or showcase any product, creating realistic UGC-style videos.
Link-to-Video converts URLs from platforms like Amazon or Shopify into professional marketing videos instantly.
Multi-Language Support enables video creation in over 23 languages, catering to diverse global audiences.
Viral Hook Analysis leverages insights from millions of TikTok and YouTube videos to craft high-performing content.
Manual Editing Suite provides intuitive tools for users to fine-tune AI-generated videos before exporting.
Royalty-Free Stock Footage offers access to a vast library to enhance video production without additional costs.

faqs.question: Does Topview AI offer a free plan?
faqs.answer: Yes, Topview AI provides a free plan with limited credits and video previews, but exported videos include a watermark.

faqs.question: Can I generate videos in languages other than English?
faqs.answer: Yes, Topview AI supports over 23 languages, including Spanish, French, German, and more, for video scripts and voiceovers.

faqs.question: What platforms does Topview AI support for importing links?
faqs.answer: Topview AI supports links from Amazon, eBay, Shopify, Etsy, AliExpress, TikTok Shop, Apple App Store, and Google Play.

faqs.question: Can I edit videos manually after AI generation?
faqs.answer: Yes, Topview AI offers a manual editing suite to customize videos before exporting.

faqs.question: Are AI voices and avatars suitable for commercial use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Topview AIâ€™s voices, background music, and avatars can be used commercially, but not for illegal content.

faqs.question: Is Topview AI compatible with mobile devices?
faqs.answer: Currently, Topview AI is web-based and supports Windows, Mac, and Linux, but not mobile devices.

faqs.question: Can I create custom AI avatars for my brand?
faqs.answer: Yes, Topview AI offers customizable AI avatars; contact their business team at official@topview.ai for details.

faqs.question: Does Topview AI provide API services?
faqs.answer: Yes, API services are available; contact the business team at official@topview.ai for more information.

faqs.question: Will exported videos have a watermark?
faqs.answer: Videos exported under the free plan have a watermark, while paid plan exports are watermark-free.

faqs.question: How does Topview AI ensure videos are engaging?
faqs.answer: Topview AI analyzes millions of viral TikTok and YouTube videos to generate scripts and hooks optimized for engagement.
